title: Neolithic feasting sites discovered in lochs across Outer Hebrides among top archaeology of 2025

title: OPINION | Purulia: A tapestry of ancient temples, lost dynasties, and secrets
description: Three decades after the notorious Arms Drop of December 17, 1995, we explore the true history of West Bengal’s Purulia. The place is home to ancient Jain temples, forgotten dynasties, and atmospheric ruins, blending cultural heritage with mysteries waiting to be uncovered

title: French Cultural Centre Karachi hosts Chanhu Daro Archaeology Exhibition
description: A three-day exhibition highlighting a decade of archaeological research at the ancient site of Chanhu Daro has opened at the French Cultural Centre in Karachi, offering visitors an insight into collaborative heritage studies conducted by French and Pakistani experts, 24NewsHD TV channel reported on Wednesday.
